section_id: ## 4. Resolution of the de Sitter Conjecture

hints.label: thm-boundary-always-ads
hints.title: Holographic Boundary is Always AdS
hints.content:
255: :label: thm-boundary-always-ads
256: 
257: For a localized system with spatial horizon at radius $L$, the **holographic boundary vacuum** (measured by IG pressure) satisfies:
258: 
259: $$
260: \Lambda_{\text{holo}} = \frac{8\pi G_N}{c^2}\frac{\Pi_{\text{IG}}}{L} < 0 \quad \forall \varepsilon_c > 0
261: $$
262: 
263: **Proof**: Rigorous position-space calculation in {prf:ref}`thm-ig-pressure-universal` (12_holography.md) shows:
264: 
265: $$
266: \Pi_{\text{IG}}(L) = -\frac{C_0 \rho_0^2 (2\pi)^{d/2} \varepsilon_c^{d+2}}{8L^2} < 0
267: $$

hints.label: thm-bulk-can-be-ds
hints.title: Bulk Can Be dS During Exploration
hints.content:
273: :label: thm-bulk-can-be-ds
274: 
275: In the **exploration-dominated regime** where walkers spread volumetrically, the **bulk effective cosmological constant** can be positive:
276: 
277: $$
278: \Lambda_{\text{eff}} = \Lambda_{\text{bulk}}^{\text{(QSD)}} + \Lambda_{\text{exploration}} = 0 + \Lambda_{\text{exploration}} > 0
279: $$
280: 
281: **Mechanism**:
282: 
283: 1. **Defocusing geometry** during exploration: Walkers avoid clustering, creating negative Ricci curvature along geodesics
284: 
285: 2. **Raychaudhuri expansion**: From {prf:ref}`thm-raychaudhuri-scutoid` (15_scutoid_curvature_raychaudhuri.md):
286: 
287:    $$
288:    \frac{d\theta}{dt} = -\frac{1}{d}\theta^2 - R_{\mu\nu}u^\mu u^\nu + \text{(shear/rotation)}
289:    $$
290: 
291:    With $R_{\mu\nu}u^\mu u^\nu < 0$ (defocusing), expansion $\theta$ can grow, generating volumetric inflation
292: 
293: 3. **Effective field equation**: Non-equilibrium source term modifies Einstein equations:
294: 
295:    $$
296:    G_{\mu\nu} + \Lambda_{\text{eff}} g_{\mu\nu} = \kappa (T_{\mu\nu} + \mathcal{J}_\mu u_\nu)
297:    $$
298: 
299:    where $\mathcal{J}_\mu \neq 0$ out of equilibrium
300: 
301: **Physical examples**:
302: - Early-universe inflation (algorithmic exploration of vacuum structure)
303: - Current dark energy era (residual exploration dynamics)
304: - Monte Carlo expansion phase in simulated annealing
305: 
306: **Status**: Mechanism is qualitatively established. Quantitative calculation requires:
307: - Solving non-equilibrium McKean-Vlasov PDE away from QSD
